professional_summary: Experienced SQL Server Database Administrator with expertise in database design, migration, disaster recovery, and high availability solutions. Proficient in various database tools and software.

key_responsibilities: Installed and configured SQL Server 2000 & 2005 fail-over cluster servers.
Migrated databases from SQL Server 2000 to 2005 in test and production environments.
Designed and developed SSIS packages using various control flow tasks
Configured Linked Servers with Kerberos authentications.
Configured Log Shipping from Production to Standby Server (Reporting Server)
Implemented DR solution using Database Mirroring and Replication.
